秏字的基本解释

秏
hào
古书上说的一种稻类植物。
古同“耗”，消耗。
姓。

秏
mào
古通“眊”，混乱：“天下秏乱，万民不安。”

秏字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hào］
［《廣韻》呼到切，去号，曉。］
［《廣韻》荒内切，去隊，曉。］
(1)稻类作物名。
(2)同“耗”。
[②]［mào］
［《集韻》莫報切，去号，明。］
(1)通“眊”。昏昧不明；昏乱。
(2)无。

秏字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【禾字部】　秏； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页850第16
【唐韻】呼到切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】虛到切，?蒿去聲。【說文】稻屬。伊尹曰：飯之美者，南海之秏。　又【廣韻】荒內切【集韻】呼內切，?音誨。義同。　又【韻補】通作耗。減也，敗也，虛也。【前漢·董仲舒傳】秏矣哀哉。今文皆作耗。互詳耒部耗字註。　又謨袍切，音蒿。義同。　又【集韻】莫報切，音?。秏亂，不明也。　又姓。

秏字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
秏字的起名意思

古书上说的一种稻类植物。

秏
Basic explanation of words
秏
hào
A kind of rice plant mentioned in ancient books.
The ancient same "consumption", consumption.
name.
秏
mào
Gu Tong "shen", chaos: "The world is chaotic, and the people are uneasy."
秏
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［hào］
["Guangyun" call to cut, go to number, Xiao. ]
["Guangyun" cut the barren inside, go to the team, Xiao. ]
(1) The name of rice crops.
(2) Same as "consumption".
[②]［mào］
["Ji Yun" Don't report to cut, go to the number, Ming. ]
(1) Through "眊". Ignorant; confused.
(2) None.
秏

[Tang Yun] Call to cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Virtual to cut,? Hao goes to sound. [Said the text] Oryza. Yi Yin said: The beauty of rice is the beauty of the South China Sea.　 [Guang Yun] Huang Qiyun [Jiyun] Calling for internal cutting,? Yin 诲. The same meaning.　[Rhyme Supplement] It's all for consumption. Decrease, defeat, and emptiness. [Previous Han·Dong Zhongshu Biography] So mournful. This article is all consumed. Mutual details of Lei Department of Consumption Note.　Mo robe cut again, sound artemisia. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] Don’t report, sound?. Chaos is unclear.　Another last name.
